paper_abstract: The first (M-1) and second (M-2) Zagreb indices and the Harary index (H) are graph invariants that found applications in chemistry. We present several new estimates for M-1 and M-2 and characterize the extremal trees. Lower and upper bounds on Harary index are obtained in terms of independence and matching numbers, as well as M-1 and M-2, and the extremal trees are characterized.
